Ideate2D.title: Ideate2D
Ideate2D.content:
🎮 Ideate2D – Make 2D Games & Apps Without the Fuss
Ideate2D is a WYSIWYG 2D game engine built on top of PyGame, designed to help you turn ideas into games—fast. Whether you’re a complete beginner or a seasoned developer who just wants to skip the boilerplate, Ideate2D is here to get you building quickly.

💡 Why Ideate2D?


Visual-first workflow: Design your levels and scenes by drawing directly—no need to code every element by hand.


Built on PyGame: Enjoy full access to one of Python’s most powerful game libraries.


Open source & hackable: Want to dig in? It’s all Python, and you’re free to extend or tweak it however you like.


No setup headaches: Install and go. No bloated dependencies or complicated configs.


Perfect for prototyping: Go from concept to playable in minutes—ideal for game jams, class projects, or testing weird ideas.


Whether it’s your first game or your next big prototype, Ideate2D helps you skip the tedium and focus on what matters: creating.

⚙️ Quick Start

Note: You’ll need to install PyGame to use Ideate2D.
Check out the official guide here:
🔗 Getting Started – PyGame Wiki


🧩 What You See Is What You Get
Ideate2D sticks to its core philosophy: What You See Is What You Get.
The final game looks exactly like what you build in the editor—no surprises, no hidden steps.
We’ve handled the essentials—like image scaling, object physics, gravity, and asset management—so you can focus on design, not setup.
